forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely between 3am and 5am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. South southeast wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run ski trail was groomed today, March 9, 2025. Grass has started to show and the north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 Lifts, Space Worm and the Rope Tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Wednesday. Conditions will be very good today.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a beautiful spring ski day. Firm snow this morning will quickly transition to softer snow by late morning. The temperature will be in the mid-40's with some sunshine. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
